content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5), transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to entities before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Make sure to connect the steam engine to a power network
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Make sure to provide fluid to pipe groups before using them
### Errors when using electricity groups without plug
-  Make sure to plug in the electricity group to an electric network

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
